landing.heroTitle: A Birthday Song Made Just for Them
landing.heroSubtitle: Tell us about the birthday person — get a fully personalized AI song in minutes. Any style, any language.
landing.demoLabel: Listen to a sample birthday song
landing.step1Desc: Fill a fun questionnaire about the birthday person — their personality, hobbies, and funny stories.
landing.step2Desc: Pick from Pop, Rap, Rock, Mizrachi, Ballad, Jazz, or Comedy — whatever fits the vibe.
landing.step3Desc: AI writes custom lyrics and produces a professional-quality song in under 5 minutes.
landing.step4Desc: Download your song, share it at the party, or send a personalized video clip.
landing.testimonial1: My mom cried when she heard her personalized song. Best birthday gift ever!
landing.testimonial2: The rap roast we got for my friend was absolutely hilarious. Worth every penny.
landing.testimonial3: I ordered songs for my whole team. Everyone was blown away by the quality.
